meanings.definition: A threadlike outgrowth of the skin on the head of a person or animal.
meanings.sent1: Her long hair flowed in the wind.
meanings.sent2: He brushed his hair before going out.
meanings.sent3: The cat's hair stood on end when it saw a mouse.
meanings.sent4: The spider's web glistened like strands of hair in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: She braided her hair into a beautiful pattern.

meanings.definition: A very small quantity or extent.
meanings.sent1: There wasn't a hair of doubt in his mind.
meanings.sent2: She didn't want a hair of chocolate in her dessert.
meanings.sent3: He wouldn't hurt a hair on your head.
meanings.sent4: The situation was so delicate, not a hair could be out of place.
meanings.sent5: The plan needed to be executed with every hair of precision.
